name: The 2 Discs, P.S
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your opponent's characters and up to 1 trait of that character, put all markers from underneath that character into your opponent's waiting room, and that character loses all of that trait until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck, choose 1 level X or lower 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of the revealed card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: And he was right. I have the proof right here.

name: Viviano Westwood & S.W
text: 【CONT】 If a climax with in its trigger icon is in your climax area, this card in all of your zones gets [[shot.gif]] in the trigger icon. 【ACT】 [Put this card at the bottom of your deck] Choose 1 of your 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters, and that character gets +3500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Tons of flaming stones are crashing down from the sky all around me, everywhere.

name: The Green Baby
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "14 Phrases, Father Pucchi", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Narciso Anastasia: "And if you haven't noticed, it has the same birthmark on its shoulder, too."

name: Lonely Numbers, Father Pucchi
text: 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 5 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. If there is a climax with in its trigger icon among those cards, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I must stay calm. Count prime numbers to compose my thoughts.

name: Guided by Destiny, Father Pucchi
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Donatello Versus & N.W" or "Rage Against Society, Ungalo" or "Rikiel & S.G", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Sons of DIO!

name: Donatello Versus & N.W
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other character is put into your waiting room from the stage, if this card is in your back stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to its previous stage position as 【REST】.
flavorText: Sure, you guys are in trouble, but you're not the only ones.

name: Kenzou & Dr.Dr
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, put them on the top of your deck in the original order, your opponent looks at up to 3 cards from the top of their deck, and puts them on the top of their deck in the original order. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character, this card gets +1 soul until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Narciso Anastasia: "He's spent the last 4- years in prison mastering the feng shui assassination, and that skill developed as his Stand power."

name: User of "Su", Guccio
text: 【CONT】 All other characters get the following abilities. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack." "【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2500 power until end of turn."
flavorText: I have no idea what you're talking about. My name is Guccio.

name: Don't Let Down Your Guard, Y.Y.M
text: 【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters get "【AUTO】 Encore [(2)]". 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent has 1 or less character in their center stage, you may choose 1 cost 0 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and put it at the bottom of their deck.
flavorText: YA-YA MA. That is my name and don't you forget it.

name: Believer of DIO, Johngalli A.
text: 【CONT】 You cannot play events or "Backup" from your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavorText: I will not lose sight of them any longer!

name: Gwess & G.G.D
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -6000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 During this card's battle, when the damage you received is canceled, you may return this card to your hand.
flavorText: Gotcha!

name: Beyond Death, Sports Maximum
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 level 0 or lower character in your waiting room, and put it in any position of your stage. 【AUTO】 [(1)] During your opponent's turn, when this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card, and at the beginning of your next encore step, put this card into your waiting room.
flavorText: My feelings of hatred towards you will still exist throughout all of eternity.

name: Father Pucchi & P.S
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 At the end of this card's attack, if "Pursuit of "Heaven"" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 cards from among them, put them on the top of your deck in any order, put the rest into your waiting room, and reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavorText: She's going after D an' G!

name: Rage Against Society, Ungalo
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or lower character from among them, put it in any position of your stage, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Nobody is gonna be able to catch up to me on this plane.

name: Rikiel & S.G
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -3000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I'll kill all three of you eventually.

name: 14 Phrases, Father Pucchi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 2 "Gravity Control, S.M" in your waiting room, and put them at the bottom of your deck in any order. 【ACT】 Fusion [Put 1 "The Green Baby" from your stage face up underneath this card as a marker] Search your deck for up to 1 "Gravity Control, S.M", put it in the stage position this card is in, put all markers from underneath this card and this card face up underneath that "Gravity Control, S.M" as a marker in any order, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Will you come to me, quickly, of your own volition?

name: Rotten Evil, Thunder McQueen
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.
flavorText: She was supposed to hit the ground and die from suicide.

name: Price of Gambling, Miraschon
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, your opponent declares higher or lower. Your opponent puts the top card of their deck into the waiting room, if that card is level 0 or lower and your opponent declared higher, or if that card is level 1 and higher and your opponent declared lower, your opponent puts the top card of their stock into their waiting room. If that card is level 0 or lower and your opponent declared lower, or if that card is level 1 and higher and your opponent declared higher, your opponent may put the top card of their deck into their stock. (Climax are regarded as level 0) 【ACT】 [【REST】 2 of your characters] All of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Mew Mew & J.L
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent's memory has 4 or more cards, your opponent chooses 3 cards in their memory, and puts all cards in their memory except those cards into their waiting room. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand.
flavorText: I'm showing you as a warning.

name: Lang Rangler & J.J.S
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, put it into their memory, and at the beginning of the encore step, your opponent puts that character from their memory in any position of their stage.
flavorText: Jumpin’ Jack Spark!

name: Plundering Memories, P.S
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +2500 power for each other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character in your back stage. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Battle for the Disc" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, this card gets +1000 power, and the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters in all their zones lose all of their card names, and do not get any card names."
flavorText: Father Pucchi: "Take a disc from my collection and hand it to me!"

name: Gravity Control, S.M
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if there is a marker underneath this card, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Jolyne Cujoh!

name: Reaching "Heaven", Father Pucchi
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock. 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: All they have accomplished is solidifying the fact that your screams will become the trumpets of hell!

name: Boundless Acceleration, M.H
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [⑧ Put 4 cards from your hand into your waiting room & Put 1 "A New World" from your climax area into your waiting room] At the beginning of your encore step, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, you get 1 additional turn.
flavorText: The time for heaven has arrived at last.

name: Pursuit of "Heaven"
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)

name: Battle for the Disc
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: Pale Snake: "It doesn't matter! You lost! Accept your fate and die!"

name: A New World
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: The true purpose of this ability is to guide the masses of humanity towards everlasting happiness.

name: Showdown With His Nemesis, Weather Forecast
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, search your deck for up to 1 "Inherited Stand, W.F", put it face up underneath this card as a marker, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 [Put 1 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character from your hand into your waiting room] Choose 1 "Inherited Stand, W.F" marker underneath this card, and put it in any position of your stage. At the end of the turn, you may put that character face up underneath this card as a marker. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Here I come.

name: To Save Her Father, Jolyne & S.O
text: 【AUTO】 Experience At the beginning of your climax phase, if the total level of the cards in your level is 3 or higher, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Mysterious Sticker, Ermes Costello
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for 1 character with the same card name as a character on your stage, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: I have to come to terms with the fact that the sticker comes out of my hand.

name: Entrusted "Hope", Emporio Alnino
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose this card and 1 of your other characters, and put them into your memory. At the beginning of your next draw phase, put those characters from your memory in separate positions of your stage. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] If you have another character with "Experience", choose 1 card in your level and 1 card in your waiting room, and exchange them.

name: Amnesia, Weather Forecast
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: Let's hide somewhere.

name: Take My F.F. Bullet, F.F.
text: 【CONT】 If you have another 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Oh, he sure is a slippery little fella, isn't he?

name: Inherited Stand, W.F
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【ACT】 effect of "Showdown With His Nemesis, Weather Forecast", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Emporio Alnino: "I'm not the one in control here. This is Weather Forecast's hidden ability."

name: Limitless Fighting Spirit, Jolyne
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 6 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Battle of Wits, F.F.
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, if your stock has 3 or less cards, this card gets +1 level and +1500 power. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: What's a priest like you doing at this prison?

name: One-on-One, Narciso Anastasia
text: 【CONT】 If your stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Restructuring Manipulation" is placed on your climax area, if you have 2 or more other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters, you may choose 1 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character in your waiting room, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 marker underneath this card into your waiting room] When your other character is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to its previous stage position as 【REST】.
flavorText: All right, stand up and get your ass in the driver's seat.

name: Will to Fight, Jolyne
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I don't understand it one bit, at least that's what I... come to realize.

name: Weather Manipulation, Weather Forecast & W.F
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Weather Forecast!

name: Meeting a Stand User, Ermes Costello
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 "Splitting and Fusing, Ermes Costello & Smc" in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker. 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] Choose 1 "Splitting and Fusing, Ermes Costello & Smc" marker underneath this card, and put it in any position of your stage. At the end of the turn, you may put that character face up underneath this card as a marker.
flavorText: Oh, how embarrassing, but I'll give them to you! The actual pair I'm wearing right this second.

name: Splitting and Fusing, Ermes Costello & Smc
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step.
flavorText: I need to see her. I've got questions, Jolyne Cujoh.

name: Flexible String, Jolyne & S.O
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order." "This card gets +3000 power until end of turn."
flavorText: Stone Ocean!!

name: The Weakness He Loves, Narciso Anastasia & D.D
text: 【CONT】 Experience During your turn, if the total level of the cards in your level is 2 or higher, this card gets +2000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 2, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn." 【AUTO】 [【REST】 1 of your other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 card in your level and 1 card in your waiting room, and exchange them.
flavorText: Since I broke out of prison, I've managed not to die somehow.

name: Spiritual Growth, Jolyne
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character in your back stage. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Experience When this card attacks, if "The Resolve to Move Forward" is in your climax area, and the total level of the cards in your level is 2 or higher, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. If the character chosen is level 3 or higher, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: If he's the assassin sent to eliminate me...

name: True "Intelligence", F.F.
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, all of your characters get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's trigger check reveals a climax, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand." 【AUTO】 Experience When this card attacks, if the total level of the cards in your level is 2 or higher, choose 1 of your other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Jolyne, my new mission is to protect you.

name: Words of Parting, F.F.
text: 【AUTO】 Experience [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", if the total level of the cards in your level is 2 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: This is my intellect, my soul.

name: Bring It On, Jolyne
text: 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 1 character from your stage into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into their waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Japanese style work?

name: Boss Lady, Ermes Costello & Smc
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【ACT】 [(2) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 character with the same card name as a character on your stage in your waiting room, and put it in any position of your stage.
flavorText: Hrahh!

name: Betting His Life on the Plan, Narciso Anastasia
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters, this card gets +6000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Diving into Bodies, Narciso Anastasia & D.D", and put it in any position of your stage.
flavorText: Do it now! Stop time--

name: Love and Revenge, Ermes Costello & Smc
text: 【CONT】 Experience During your turn, if the total level of the cards in your level is 5 or higher, this card gets +6000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Staking Her Life on Revenge" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character, draw up to 3 cards, choose 2 cards in your hand, and put them into your waiting room.
flavorText: What? Are you gonna try to hide again? You can't do that anymore.

name: Diving into Bodies, Narciso Anastasia & D.D
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: Overwhelming Force of Will, Jolyne & S.O
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Connected Hope, Jolyne" in your waiting room, and put it in any position of your stage. 【AUTO】 Experience When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the total level of the cards in your level is 6 or higher, you may choose 1 character in your opponent's waiting room, and put it in an open position of their stage.
flavorText: Good freaking grief.

name: Unyielding Battle, Weather Forecast & W.F
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters. 【AUTO】 Experience When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the total level of the cards in your level is 6 or higher, draw up to 2 cards, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: The kind of evil that doesn't even realize it's evil... is the most disgusting kind of them all!

name: Connected Hope, Jolyne
text: 【CONT】 If you have 3 or more other characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【AUTO】 effect of "Overwhelming Force of Will, Jolyne & S.O", you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Experience [(1) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] At the end of this card's attack, if "Will That Connects Hope" is in your climax area, and the total level of the cards in your level is 6 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 4 damage to your opponent, and if the character facing this card is 【REVERSE】, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Keep on living. You're our only hope!

name: Miraculous Meeting, Narciso Anastasia & Jolyne
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may perform the following effect. "Your opponent chooses 1 climax in their waiting room, returns all cards except that card from their waiting room to their deck, and shuffles their deck." 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's level 1 or higher characters, your opponent chooses 1 level X or lower character in their waiting room, and exchanges them. X is equal to the level of the character you chose -1.
flavorText: Narciso Anastasia: "All I'll ask from her is to know and embrace how I truly feel."

name: To Protect His Daughter
text: 【COUNTER】 If you have 5 or more 《Stand User》 or 《Stand》 characters, choose 1 character in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot deal damage to a player." Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Jolyne: "Old man..."

name: Restructuring Manipulation
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: It doesn't matter what his attack methods are.

name: The Resolve to Move Forward
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
